name: 12V Battery
description: 12V battery (CCA rating for US, Ah and EN/SAE size for UK).

name: A/C Compressor Oil
description: PAG or POE oil specific to A/C system.

name: A/C Refrigerant
description: Refrigerant (R-134a, R-1234yf) and system capacity.

name: AdBlue/DEF (Diesel)
description: Aqueous urea solution for Selective Catalytic Reduction (SCR) systems.

name: Air Filter
description: Engine intake air filter specification.

name: Auxiliary/Drive Belt
description: Serpentine/V-belt for alternator, A/C, etc. (length and rib count).

name: Brake Discs/Rotors (Front)
description: Front brake discs/rotors (dimensions, material, ventilated or solid).

name: Brake Discs/Rotors (Rear)
description: Rear brake discs/rotors.

name: Brake Fluid
description: Hydraulic brake fluid (DOT 3, DOT 4, DOT 5.1). DOT 4 is UK/EU standard.

name: Brake Pads (Front)
description: Front brake pads (low-metallic, ceramic, etc.).

name: Brake Pads (Rear)
description: Rear brake pads.

name: Cabin/Pollen Filter
description: Passenger compartment air filter (standard or activated carbon).

name: Clutch Fluid
description: Hydraulic fluid for clutch master/slave cylinder (often shared with brake fluid).

name: Clutch Kit
description: Complete clutch kit (pressure plate, friction disc, release bearing).

name: Differential Oil
description: Gear oil for rear/front differential (viscosity e.g., 75W-90 and GL rating).

name: Engine Coolant/Antifreeze
description: Coolant type (OAT, HOAT). Note concentrate or ready-mix ratio.

name: Engine Flush/Catalytic Converter Cleaner
description: Engine flush and catalytic converter cleaner; specify product and application instructions.

name: Engine Gasket Set
description: Set of gaskets for engine components (rocker cover, sump, inlet manifold). Specify material (e.g., cork, rubber, composite).

name: Engine Mounts
description: Rubber/hydraulic engine mounts for vibration damping.

name: Engine Oil
description: Engine oil specification (e.g., 5W-30). Note SAE (US) and ACEA (EU/UK) ratings. Check manufacturer's recommended capacity.

name: Exhaust Gasket Set
description: Set of gaskets for exhaust manifold, downpipe, and joint connections.

name: Front Tyres/Tires
description: Front tyre/tire size, load/speed rating, and cold pressure. Metric (e.g., 225/45R17) or imperial sizing.

name: Fuel Filter
description: In-line or in-tank fuel filter for petrol/gasoline or diesel.

name: Fuel Pump
description: In-tank or external fuel pump (specify petrol/gasoline or diesel).

name: Grease/Lubricant
description: Multi-purpose lithium or silicone-based grease for joints, bearings, locks.

name: Headlight Bulbs
description: Halogen (H1, H4, H7), HID (D1S, D2S), or LED bulb specification.

name: Horn
description: Electric horn (single or dual tone).

name: Ignition Coils
description: Ignition coil(s) for spark plug firing.

name: Indicator/Direction Lamp Bulb
description: Indicator / direction (turn signal) lamp bulb (e.g., PY21W, 1157). Include polarity/LED type where applicable.

name: Interior Bulbs
description: Bulbs for interior lighting (dome, map, glovebox).

name: Locking Wheel Nut Key
description: Security key for locking wheel nuts.

name: Number Plate/Registration Plate Bulbs
description: Bulbs for illuminating the rear number/registration plate.

name: Oil Drain Plug Gasket
description: Crush washer or gasket for sump drain plug.

name: Oil Filter
description: Spin-on or cartridge engine oil filter.

name: Power Steering Fluid
description: Hydraulic power steering fluid (ATF-compatible or specific type).

name: Radiator Cap
description: Pressure-rated radiator cap.

name: Rear Tyres/Tires
description: Rear tyre/tire specification and pressure. Note 'PSI' (US) or 'Bar' (UK/EU).

name: Shock Absorbers/Struts
description: Front/rear suspension dampers (note if complete strut assembly).

name: Spark Plugs
description: Spark plug type, heat range, gap, and quantity (Iridium, Platinum, Copper).

name: Taillight/Brake Light Bulbs
description: Bulbs for rear tail, brake, and indicator/turn signal lights.

name: Thermostat
description: Engine thermostat with specified opening temperature (e.g., 88Â°C).

name: Thermostat Housing Gasket
description: Gasket for thermostat housing. Specify material.

name: Timing Belt/Chain Kit
description: Complete timing component kit (belt/chain, tensioners, guides).

name: Transfer Case Fluid
description: Fluid for transfer case on 4WD/AWD vehicles.

name: Transmission Fluid
description: Automatic Transmission Fluid (ATF) or manual gear oil. Specify Dexron, Mercon, or manufacturer-specific type.

name: Wheel Bearings
description: Front or rear wheel bearing/hub assembly.

name: Wheel Nuts/Bolts
description: Set of wheel securing nuts or bolts.

name: Windscreen/Windshield Washer Fluid
description: Screenwash concentrate (summer, winter anti-freeze, or all-season).

name: Windscreen/Windshield Wiper Blade (Rear)
description: Rear wiper blade (if applicable).

name: Windscreen/Windshield Wiper Blades (Front)
description: Front wiper blades with hook, pin, or bayonet attachment.
